document_data.name: Festhall of Eternal Delight
document_data.mainbody: The '''Festhall of Eternal Delight''' was the center of [[Sharess]]' worship in [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located along the waterfront in [[Calimport]].
document_data.Description: The Festhall of Eternal Delight was an extravagant complex consisting of dark [[marble]] columns, tall spires, pristine gardens, and priceless crystalline statues. The baths within the temple were famous for their rejuvenating effects. The many flowers decorating the complex provided aphrodisiac and calming effects for patrons.
document_data.History: A previous temple to Sharess existed on the same location but was destroyed by the [[Night Parade]].
document_data.Defenses: The temple was guarded by a variety of creatures including [[giant]]s, [[ogres]], a [[faerie dragon]], an air-breathing [[sirine]], and others.
